programme.title: Dennis Taylor
programme.short_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is snooker player Dennis Taylor
programme.medium_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is snooker player Dennis Taylor.
programme.long_synopsis:
Dennis Taylor became the world snooker champion in a dramatic match against Steve Davis last April. In conversation with Michael Parkinson, he describes his childhood in County Tyrone, Jim-Joe Gervin's billiard hall where he first took up snooker, and how he became a professional.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs]

Favourite track: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes by The Platters
Book: Joke book
Luxury: Limitless supply of yoghurt

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
